name: Kalisetti Dheeraj Babu
title: Software Engineer
summary: Software Engineer experienced in full-stack development, backend and frontend technologies, big data analytics, multi-cloud infrastructure (AWS, GCP, Azure), DevOps practices, and cyber-security. Skilled in Python, Java, JavaScript, React.js, Django, Apache Spark, Hadoop, RESTful APIs, OAuth2.0, CI/CD pipelines, API security, and Agile methodologies. Proven track record building scalable, secure, no-code platforms and data-driven applications.
skills: Azure (HDInsight, Synapse, Blob Storage, Cosmos DB)

experience.description: Building a game-changing big data analytics platform enabling no-code data querying and visualization. Developed full-stack applications using React.js and Django with secure OAuth. Implemented GA4 analytics, anomaly detection, behavior flow visualization tools boosting engagement by 25%. Leveraged Spark, PySpark, Hadoop, BigQuery, Dataproc for distributed processing reducing query times by 30%. Managed infrastructure across AWS, GCP, Azure with 99.9% uptime.

Designed and deployed scalable software solutions. Reduced bug resolution time by 35% through improved debugging processes. Delivered projects including ALC Offer Migration, Tiered Pinning, and Airflow migration.
Performed network log monitoring, vulnerability assessments, and penetration testing simulations. Improved security posture by 20% through documented findings.

projects.name: aihub – Multi-AI Chat Platform
projects.description: Unified conversational workspace integrating Grok, DeepSeek, Claude, and ChatGPT using React and FastAPI. Features persistent sessions, local storage, and responsive UI.

projects.name: Real Estate Platform
projects.description: Freelance project. Developed full-stack web and mobile application for property listings and lead tracking using Django REST, React, and Expo Go. Improved agent productivity by 60%.

projects.name: Auction Management System
projects.description: Django-based auction platform with dynamic bidding, secure transactions, and real-time updates.
